topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5469de05636872626d8c0300#post_5469de05636872626d8c0300
A _teensy bit_ worse than that, unfortunately. You see, about two years ago my family had to move back to Finland from Estonia. On the plus side, i got my own apartment. On the downside, now all my friends live pretty far away on the other side of the sea. Also, my exceedingly rare sleep disorder that forces me to live a mostly nocturnal life and my anxiousness about meeting new people have kept me from making any new friends.

So, for the past two years, my only contacts with people have been limited to visits from my family, rare visits to my friends, and chatting to people online. This has of course lead to depression. I am seeing a psychiatrist about that.

So yeah. I am pretty firmly in the sweat closet. ^only finnish speakers will get that pun i'm afraid^
topics.author: 5007bbdf7f123b112f00023a

topics.body:
"@PaskaNaakka":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5469e14d636872313c7f0000#post_5469e14d636872313c7f0000
I feel this on a emotional level; except my problem is everyone at my college only wants to talk about Naruto or such and I can't find a boyfriend cause the majority of glbt in my college are so far in the closet they missed the turn to Narnia even though my college openly accepts glbt.

Other people at college, "hey let's talk about naruto!"
"Eh; I'm not a fan of naruto; anyone play any video games?"
"Let's talk about call of duty then!"
"Anyone play league of legends/touhou/stalker/bioshock/dayz/FNaF/Devil May Cry with the original Dante/Pscyhonauts. . . Bastion/FTL/Okami. . . Shadow of Colossus/Garry's mod or such?"
"Ughhh. . . you lost us at 'league of legends'.  What is that?  A card game?"
". . . Okay; what about anime then?"
"Oh sure; we love anime!"
"Oh cool; anyone else watch the last movie of Madoka?  Also I still need to get caught up on Fate/stay; I still need to watch that."
". . . Ughhhhhh. . . "

I'm just going to admit it; this is one of the drawbacks about how nerd culture has gone mainstream is that "nerds(tm)" 97% of them only care about the latest flavor of the month and only wear the nerd title cause being a nerd is the new cool thing.  I don't mean to sound like a hipster, but jeez folks expand your repertoire once in a while.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
